page.description: Returns name of associated groups (table or report level if defined).
page.original:
&ltTBL>.GET_GROUP_NAME() Syntax OutputString as C = &ltTBL>.GET_GROUP_NAME( [ Index as N ] ) ArgumentDescription Index
Description The &ltTBL>.GET_GROUP_NAME() method returns the group of a table. Example dim ptr as P ptr = table.open("product") ? ptr.get_group_name() = Grand
See Also Table Functions and Methods
